title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, April 4, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of Maya Angelou (1928-2014), who is best known for her writing but who also was a dancer, singer, civil rights activist, and world traveler.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Maya Angelou (1928-2014), who is best known for her writing but who also was a dancer, singer, civil rights activist, and world traveler.
